channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Adaptogenic drinks: The Race to Make Your Coffee Do More and More
item.description: Adaptogenic drinks are having a moment, as brands embrace ingredients with claims to improve focus, energy, and productivity, without caffeine jitters...

item.title: Jump raises $12M to help freelancers get benefits just like employees
item.description: Jump offers full-time contracts to freelancers looking for some stability and the benefits involved with a full-time job. © 2024 TechCrunch. All right...

item.title: In Praise of Climate Virtue Signaling
item.description: Politicians and other leaders don’t like to brag about their green credentials. But what if a little virtue is exactly what we’re missing?

item.title: SoftBank’s Masayoshi Son has been planning his comeback
item.description: A new Financial Times profile of Mayayoshi Son opens with SoftBank’s CEO seeming to hit bottom, staring at his “ugly” face on Zoom and telling himself...

item.title: TikTok's Defense Strategy Involves Throwing Shein and Temu Under the Bus
item.description: In an attempt to defend itself against a ban in the US, TikTok has pointed out that other Chinese companies could be collecting as much data as it doe...

item.title: Matt Mullenweg calls WP Engine a ‘cancer to WordPress’ and urges community to switch providers
item.description: Automattic CEO and WordPress co-creator Matt Mullenweg unleashed a scathing attack on a rival firm this week, calling WP Engine a “cancer to WordPress...

item.title: 18 Best Fitness Trackers (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you’re skiing in the backcountry or trampolining in the backyard, we have an activity tracker for you.

item.title: Synex founder, once detained at the border with an 80-pound magnet, is building portable MRIs to test glucose
item.description: Synex Medical just raised $21.8 million to build a portable MRI capable of testing glucose and other important molecules without the need to extract b...

item.title: This New Pac-Man Machine Brought Me Closer to My Teen Kids
item.description: The Pac-Man arcade cabinet from Arcade1Up brings retro gaming joy to the whole family.

item.title: Yup, Jony Ive is working on an AI device startup with OpenAI
item.description: Jony Ive, the legendary designer who left his full-time role at Apple five years ago, is working on a new startup with OpenAI and its CEO Sam Altman. ...
